title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with a creamy sauce made of eggs, cheese, and pancetta.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: A refreshing salad made with grilled chicken, crisp lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

title: Beef Stir-Fry
description: Quick and flavorful stir-fry with tender beef, colorful vegetables, and savory sauce.

title: Vegetable Curry
description: Aromatic and spicy curry loaded with assorted vegetables, served with fluffy rice.

title: Caprese Salad
description: Simple and elegant salad with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, and balsamic glaze.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Juicy salmon fillets seasoned with herbs and grilled to perfection.

title: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy and comforting risotto packed with earthy mushrooms and parmesan cheese.

title: Greek Salad
description: Fresh and vibrant salad featuring tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, feta cheese, and a zesty dressing.

title: Beef Tacos
description: Tasty tacos filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, salsa, and sour cream.

title: Vegetable Quinoa Bowl
description: Nutritious quinoa bowl loaded with colorful vegetables and drizzled with tahini sauce.
